title: Warlord - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Harem   Mature   Mystery   Sci-fi   Tragedy
tags: Amnesia   Apocalypse   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Mutations   Post-apocalyptic   Romantic Subplot   Soldiers   Special Abilities   Time Skip   Zombies
author: Chen Ran   辰燃
description:
Death and destruction swept the world after the Catastrophe happened! The Earth was ruled by the rules of the jungle as law and order are now part of history. 

He woke up from a deep sleep. This crazy world was reflected in his golden eye; One person in the abyss of darkness!>
